availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Christian County and Union County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. North Carolina native. Son of George W. Jeffries and Elizabeth Betsy Jeffries. Married to Lydia Cullin Jeffries in Union County, Kentucky, on July 15, 1856. Father of Laura Jeffries. Laborer in Christian County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 2, p. 374A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 455.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994056, Union County Marriages.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994056, Union County Deaths, p. 2.
